description:
Nobunaga starts his advance into Mino. The daimyo of Mino, Saito Tatsuoki, is a good-for-nothing, but his forces included the Mino Three and the genius strategist, Takenaka Hanbee. Their combination proves to be powerful, and Nobunaga is forced to retreat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If Your Boss Doesn`t Favor You
Si on n’a pas un bon supérieur
上司にめぐまれなかったら
